org.compiere.plaf
Class ColorBlind

java.lang.Object
  org.compiere.plaf.ColorBlind

public class ColorBlind
extends java.lang.Object

Color Blind Utilities. These utilities help to show how color blind/challenged see colors. Created by Thomas Wolfmaier. Copyright (C) 1999-2005 HCIRN. All rights reserved.

Version:
$Id: ColorBlind.java,v 1.7 2005/03/11 20:34:36 jjanke Exp $
Author:
Comunidad de Desarrollo openXpertya *Basado en Codigo Original Modificado, Revisado y Optimizado de: * Thomas Wolfmaier
See Also:
HCIRN
